word: der Halt die schnauze, die There seems to be a mistake in the example "der der halt die schnauze". it is not clear what the intended singular and plural forms are. could you please provide the correct information?
definition: A colloquial phrase used to express a strong command or request for someone to stop talking or be quiet. It is commonly employed in informal settings or when expressing frustration or annoyance.

examples.german: Halt die Schnauze und lass mich in Ruhe!
examples.english: Shut your trap and leave me alone!

examples.german: Wenn du nicht aufhörst zu nerven, dann halt die Schnauze!
examples.english: If you don't stop annoying, then shut your mouth!

examples.german: Halt die Schnauze, ich kann dich nicht mehr hören!
examples.english: Shut up, I can't hear you anymore!

examples.german: Halt die Schnauze und konzentriere dich auf deine Arbeit!
examples.english: Shut your gob and focus on your work!

examples.german: Halt die Schnauze, du bist so laut!
examples.english: Shut your pie hole, you're so loud!
